id.description: Unique ID for the payment method

version.description: Version assigned to the payment method

name.description: Name assigned to the method, either provided or calculated

paymentScheme.description: Payment Scheme for the method, e.g. card_visa, paypal_business

validFrom.description: Unix timestamp of the valid from date for this merthod

expiry.description: Unix timestamp of the expiry date for this merthod

info.description: Additional information about this payment method

tokenID.description: Unique ID for the payments underlying token

profileFingerprint.description: Unique Fingerprint for the method across all methods by this profile

merchantFingerprint.description: Unique Fingerprint for the method across the merchant

tokenExpiry.description: The expiry date of the underlying token
